title: Tremors 3 - Back to Perfection (Michael Gross)
description:
TREMORS 3 - BACK TO PERFECTION - 2001

  Burt Gummer (Michael Gross) is back and this time he's prepared. Perfection Nevada to discover has been turned into a tourist trap. Jack Sawyer (Shawn Christian) is running a graboid safari ride ripping off Perfection Valley tourists until the day when a real graboid comes along. Just before he leaves to destroy the graboids in Perfection once and for all, three government agents come and stop Burt from killing the worms because they are an endangered species. The agents head out to capture a live graboid but only one returns after being attacked by shriekers. So Burt heads out with Jack, Chang (Susan Chuang), and Miguel to stop the shriekers but they mutate again. Now the town of Perfection has to find a way to stop the new creatures before they take over town and then the rest of Nevada. 

  Starring: Michael Gross, Shawn Christian, Susan Chuang, Charlotte Stewart, Ariana Richards.

  Directed by: Brent Maddock.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 43min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 720 x 448
